name: Gar Clicker 2k24
description:
Gar Clicker 2k24 is the very first fully Gar-centric experience, and the most realistic simulation of Gar that science is capable of achieving so far. The newest version features photo-realistic garaphics as well as letting you actually play the game without random crashes! Gar-tastic!!!
